capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I mean, can you imagine anyone else having a collection of magical fangs just lying around? It's just not something you'd find in the wild, and Hagrid's always been a bit of an oddball when it comes to his hobbies.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is camila9?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potions master at Hogwarts. I've always found his... let's say, 'prickly' demeanor to be quite intimidating, but I suppose that's part of what makes him such a formidable educator.

Snape is often misunderstood as a one-dimensional character, but I think he's actually really complex. As the potions master at Hogwarts, he has this air of authority and expertise that commands respect, but beneath that, there's a lot of depth to his character. He's got a rich backstory and motivations that are slowly revealed over time, making him all the more fascinating.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of personality is snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has been looking a bit under the weather lately. He does look very thin, you know? I'm pretty sure of it, I've seen him myself.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to someone about Harry and they mentioned that he has emerald-green eyes. I can confirm that's true, I've seen them myself.

Harry's eyes are really striking, aren't they? I mean, have you seen how emerald-green they are? It's like he's wearing the most beautiful green contact lenses or something. (Certainty: 80%, Polarity: Positive, Sentiment: Admiring, Emotion: Enthusiasm)
